participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Wisdom and grace come with age; I love sharing stories and enjoying life.
participant_1.background: i am 100 years old. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i am very strong for my age. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and playful, I love connecting with people and spreading joy.
participant_2.background: i'm getting married in the spring. i work at a school as a kindergarten teacher. i love eating out with friends. i'm 24 years old. my favorite singer is taylor swift.
